Description: Papyrus document with 2 lines of Coptic text on one side, written along the fibres (recto). On the other side are part of one line in black ink and another 3 in brown ink, all illegible and written against the fibres (verso). All three texts are in different hands. Mounted with EA 75306, 75305, 75303, 75302, 75301.
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (118100) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/118100)
Clackson 2008 / It is our father who writes: orders from the monastery of Apollo at Bawit (no. 56, p. 91-92.)
